s1.title: 1. Controller
s1.p1: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:

s21.title: 2.1 Scope of processing of personal data
s21.p1: We generally process personal data only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website and our content and services. Personal data is usually processed only with the user's consent.

s22.title: 2.2 Legal basis for processing personal data
s22.p1: Where we obtain consent for processing personal data, Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR serves as the legal basis.
s22.p2: When processing personal data is necessary to perform a contract, Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR serves as the legal basis.
s22.p3: Where processing personal data is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR serves as the legal basis.
s22.p4: Where processing is necessary to protect vital interests of the data subject or another natural person, Art. 6(1)(d) GDPR serves as the legal basis.
s22.p5: Where processing is necessary for legitimate interests pursued by our company or a third party and the interests, fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject do not override those interests, Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR serves as the legal basis.

s31.title: 3.1 Google Authentication
s31.p1: This website uses Google Authentication for user sign-in. The following data is collected:
s31.p2: Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR for performance of the user contract.

s32.title: 3.2 Firebase Services
s32.p1: We use Firebase (a service of Google LLC) for the following purposes:

list.firestore: Storing quiz data, user information and learning progress

s32.p2: We use Firebase in the Frankfurt (eu-central) region. Firebase may process data in data centers worldwide. Google LLC is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
s32.p3: More information can be found in Google's privacy policy:
s32.p4: For push notifications we store FCM tokens and technical device information. Delivery is only based on your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR); you can withdraw consent at any time.

s33.title: 3.3 Google Gemini AI
s33.p1: For automatic quiz generation we use Google Gemini AI. Uploaded documents (PDFs, images) are temporarily transmitted to Google to generate quiz questions. The documents are not stored permanently after processing.
s33.p2: Use is based on your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) by actively using the quiz generation feature.

s34.title: 3.4 Notification server (Render)
s34.p1: For delivery of push notifications and background tasks we operate a server at Render.com (Frankfurt region).
s34.p2: Technical access data (e.g., IP address, timestamps, request logs) as well as FCM tokens are processed. The legal basis is Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of the contract) or Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent for push).

s5.title: 5. Data retention and deletion
s5.p1: Your data is stored as long as you actively use your user account. You can delete your account at any time, which removes all your personal data.
s5.p2: Quizzes you created are retained in anonymized form after account deletion if other users access them (e.g., co-authors or participants).
s5.p3: Log and error data is stored only as long as necessary to ensure operations and analyze errors.

s6.title: 6. Your rights
s6.p1: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR)
access.desc: You have the right to obtain information about your stored data.

rectification.title: Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
rectification.desc: You can request correction of inaccurate data.

erasure.title: Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR)
erasure.desc: You can request deletion of your data.

restriction.title: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
restriction.desc: You can request restriction of processing.

portability.title: Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
portability.desc: You can receive your data in a structured format.

objection.title: Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR)
objection.desc: You can object to the processing of your data.

withdrawal.title: Right to withdraw consent
withdrawal.desc: You can withdraw any consent you have given at any time.

s6.p2: To exercise your rights, please contact us at:

s7.title: 7. Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
s7.p1: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority.
s7.p2: The supervisory authority responsible for us is:

s8.title: 8. Cookies and local storage
s8.p1: This website does not use tracking cookies. Firebase Authentication and your theme preference are stored in local browser storage (localStorage) to ensure the functionality of the app.
s8.p2: If you consent, we load Google Fonts (Material Icons) from Google. Your IP address may be transmitted to Google. Your consent is stored locally and can be withdrawn at any time.

s9.title: 9. SSL/TLS encryption
s9.p1: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, this website uses SSL/TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the browser address bar switching from "http://" to "https://".

s10.title: 10. Changes to this privacy policy
s10.p1: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy so that it always complies with current legal requirements or to reflect changes to our services. The new privacy policy applies when you visit the site again.

s11.title: 11. Contact
s11.p1: If you have questions about data protection or want to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
